name: NASA discord bot

name: Guidance Grid Frontend
description: Guidance Grid is a project under GDSC NIT Silchar that aims at helping you to seek assistance and guidance from your peers and seniors. It allows you to upvote, downvote, and bookmark the content of your choice and comes with a trending article section displaying posts based on public reception. Uses ReactJS, sass.

name: Guidance Grid Backend
description: Backend for Guidance Grid using Prisma, Express, MongoDB, PassportJS.

name: codekon
